overview.title: How to Pray the Holy Rosary
overview.intro: The Holy Rosary is a meditative prayer that guides us through the life of Jesus and Mary.

steps.title: Steps of the Rosary
list: Make the Sign of the Cross.
Announce the First Mystery and say the Our Father.
Pray ten Hail Marys while meditating on the Mystery.
Finish with the Hail Holy Queen.

glorious.title: The Glorious Mysteries (Wednesday and Sunday)
list: The Descent of the Holy Spirit

apostlesCreed.title: Apostles' Creed
apostlesCreed.text: I believe in God, the Father almighty, Creator of heaven and earth; and in Jesus Christ, His only Son, Our Lord, Who was conceived by the Holy Spirit, born of the Virgin Mary, suffered under Pontius Pilate, was crucified, died, and was buried. He descended into hell; on the third day He rose again from the dead; He ascended into Heaven, and is seated at the right hand of God, the Father almighty; from there He will come to judge the living and the dead. I believe in the Holy Spirit, the holy Catholic Church, the communion of saints, the forgiveness of sins, the resurrection of the body, and life everlasting. Amen.

ourFather.title: Our Father
ourFather.text: Our Father, Who art in heaven, Hallowed be Thy Name. Thy Kingdom come. Thy Will be done, on earth as it is in Heaven. Give us this day our daily bread. And forgive us our trespasses, as we forgive those who trespass against us. And lead us not into temptation, but deliver us from evil. Amen.

hailMary.title: Hail Mary
hailMary.text: Hail Mary, Full of Grace, The Lord is with thee. Blessed art thou among women, and blessed is the fruit of thy womb, Jesus. Holy Mary, Mother of God, pray for us sinners now, and at the hour of death. Amen

gloryBe.title: Glory Be
gloryBe.text: Glory be to the Father and to the Son,and to the Holy Spirit. As it was in the beginning, is now, and ever shall be, world without end. Amen.

hailHolyQueen.title: Hail Holy Queen
hailHolyQueen.text: Hail Holy Queen Mother of Mercy, our life, our sweetness and our hope! To thee do we cry, poor banished children of Eve; to thee do we send up our sighs, mourning and weeping in this vale of tears. Turn then, most gracious advocate, thine eyes of mercy toward us, and after this our exile, show unto us the blessed fruit of thy womb, Jesus. O clement, O loving, O sweet Virgin Mary! Pray for us, O Holy Mother of God. That we may be made worthy of the promises of Christ. Amen.
